abstract: The telecommunications company is said to be in negotiations, in what may be the latest round of deal making in its industry.
snippet: The telecommunications company is said to be in negotiations, in what may be the latest round of deal making in its industry.
lead_paragraph: The telecommunications company Avaya is in negotiations to sell a part or all of itself, in what may be the latest round of deal making in its industry, executives briefed on the negotiations said last night.

headline.main: Avaya Is Said to Be Exploring a Sale of All or Some of Itself
headline.print_headline: Avaya Is Said to Be Exploring A Sale of All or Some of Itself

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
